quoteText:
Upon registration or creation of a user account and profile as a Shmoop user, User must provide personal information to Shmoop.
User affirms that the personal information provided about User is correct, accurate, and true as of the time of registration or creation of the user profile.
User will update personal information on the Shmoop website on a regular basis.
title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

tosdr.case: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
